sentences.sentence: I use the eau DE toilette from Issey Miyake!
sentences.translation: 我可是用了“三宅一生”的淡香水呢！

sentences.sentence: French men and women take two hours over their morning toilette.
sentences.translation: 法国人，男人也好女人也好，早上要花两个小时梳洗打扮。

sentences.sentence: When the ladies were separating for the toilette, he said to Elizabeth.
sentences.translation: 当娘儿们正要各自去打扮的时候，他又对伊丽莎白说。
